name: general
description: Download data tables in csv (excel) and json formats.

name: demo-package
description: Description for demo-package.

name: country-list
description: Country list: ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 English country names and code elements as two letter country codes. Also known as +2 country code and iso 3166.

name: s-and-p-500-companies
description: List of companies in the S&P 500 (Standard and Poor's 500). Top 500 stocks in the US by market cap. S&P 500 companies or S&P 500 index.

name: world-cities
keywords: list of cities in the world
description: List of all major cities in the world by country and administrative region.

name: language-codes
description: Comprehensive language code information, consisting of ISO 639-1, ISO 639-2 and IETF language types. Two letter language codes. IETF language tags.

name: country-codes
keywords: Country or Area official names in different languages
Alpha-2 Alpha-3 and Numeric codes from ISO 3166-1
ISO 4217 country name and currency number of minor units
ISO 4217 currency name and currency numeric code
description: Comprehensive country code information, including ISO 3166 codes, ITU dialing codes, ISO 4217 currency codes, and many others.

name: global-temp
keywords: global monthly mean data temperature anomalies
description: Global temperature data or gistemp: average temperature by year, temperature time series, monthly mean data temperature anomalies.

name: population-growth-estimates-and-projections
keywords: population estimates for low medium and high fertility variants
description: Population growth estimates and projections for low, medium and high fertility variants.

name: continent-codes
description: List of continents: continent abbreviations and ISO continent codes.

name: airport-codes
keywords: Airport codes from around the world
description: Airport codes. IATA airport code. ICAO airport code. Airport codes from around the world and coordinates.

name: un-locode
keywords: United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations
description: The United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations. Known as unlocode, un/locode or un location code.

name: bond-yields-uk-10y
description: 10 year nominal yields on UK government bonds from the Bank of England: quarterly and annual data, UK 10 year gilt yield.

name: gold-prices
description: Monthly gold prices since 1950 in USD (London market). Historical gold prices csv, excel, json. Gold price data.

name: s-and-p-500
description: S&P 500 index data including level, dividend, earnings and P/E ratio on a monthly basis since 1870. The data provided here is a tidied and CSV’d version of that collected and prepared by the Economist Robert Shiller.

name: bond-yields-us-10y
keywords: us 10 year bond yield historical data
description: 10 year nominal yields on US government bonds from the Federal Reserve. The 10 year government bond yield is considered a standard indicator of long-term interest rates. The data is updated on monthly basis.

name: currency-codes
description: List of currencies and their 3 digit codes as defined by ISO 4217. The data provided here is the consolidation of Table A.1 'Current currency & funds code list' and Table A.3 'Historic denominations'.

name: oil-prices
keywords: brent crude oil price history excel
description: Europe Brent and WTI (Western Texas Intermediate) Spot Prices from EIA U.S. (Energy Information Administration). Data is available as annual, monthly, weekly and daily timeseries.

name: iso-container-codes
description: Coded list of ISO 6346 shipping containers, used in international trade and electronic shipping messages.

name: imf-weo
description: IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) database. The source database is made of annual values for each country on 45 indicators since 1980. In addition the database includes the IMF projects approximately 6 years into the future.

name: euribor
description: Euribor rates by year and granularity for all available maturity levels. Only monthly granularity is provided. The oldest available data are from 1999.

name: house-prices-us
description: Case-Shiller Index of US residential house prices. Data comes from S&P Case-Shiller data and includes both the national index and the indices for 20 metropolitan regions. The indices are created using a repeat-sales methodology.

name: gdp-us
keywords: united states of america gross domestic product
description: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of the United States (US) both nominal and real on an annual and quarterly basis. Annual data is provided since 1930 and quarterly data since 1947. Both total GDP (levels) and annualized percentage change in GDP are provided. Both levels and changes are available both in current dollars (nominal GDP) and in chained 2009 dollars (real GDP).

name: top-level-domain-names
description: The delegation details of top-level domains. The data were copied manually from “The Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA)” site, and then posted to Excel file and saved as CSV file.

name: co2-ppm
description: CO2 PPM - Trends in Atmospheric Carbon Dioxide. Two main series are provided: the Mauna Loa series (which has the longest continuous series since 1958) and a Global Average series (a global average over marine surface sites).
